憪字的基本解释

憪
xián
闲适；愉快：“循省诚知惧，安排祗自憪。”

憪
xiàn
不安：“朕既不能远德，故憪然念外人之有非。”
激愤的样子：“憪然谓天下无人。”
宽大。
戾。

憪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xiàn］
［《廣韻》下赧切，上潸，匣。］
(1)不安貌。参见“憪然”。
(2)骄横貌。参见“憪然”。
[②]［xián］
［《廣韻》户閒切，平山，匣。］
闲适。

憪字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　憪； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页403第31
【唐韻】戸閒切【集韻】【韻會】何閒切。【說文】愉也。从心閒聲。【廣韻】心靜也。或作?。　又【玉篇】【廣韻】【集韻】?下赧切，音僩。【廣韻】寬大貌。　又不安貌。【史記·文帝紀】憪然念外人之有非。　又勁忿貌。【唐書·王叔文傳】憪然以爲天下無人。　又【韻會】【正韻】?下?切，音限。義同。

憪字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
憪字的起名意思

暂无。

憪
Basic explanation of words
憪
xián
Leisurely; happy: "Respect and sincerely know and fear, arrange only for self-preservation."
憪
xiàn
Uneasy: "I can't be far-reaching, so I don't know what's wrong with outsiders."
An angry look: "It seems that there is no one in the world."
Lenient.
Stubborn.
憪
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xiàn］
["Guangyun" cut at the bottom, Lu, box at the top. ]
(1) Uneasy appearance. See "Lian Ran".
(2) Arrogant appearance. See "Lian Ran".
[②]［xián］
["Guangyun" household leisure cutting, Pingshan, Xie. ]
Leisurely.
憪
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　憪; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 403 31
[Tang Yun] Xian Xian [Ji Yun] [Rhyme] He Xian Xian. [Said the text] Yu also. Idle from the heart. [Guang Yun] My heart is calm. Or for?.　[Yu Pian] [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Next cut, sound 僩. 【Guang Yun】Large appearance.　Uneasy appearance again. 【Historical Records·Wendi Ji】Looking at the wrongs of outsiders.　An awkward appearance. [Tang Shu·Wang Shuwen Biography] I thought there was no one in the world.　[Rhyme Club] [Zheng Yun]? Down? Cut, pitch limit. The same meaning.
憪
